data.title: Allergy & Asthma Specialists
data.meta_description: This allergy and asthma office serves patients in Lansdale, PA and the surrounding Philadelphia metro area.
data.text:
Allergy Testing & Treatment in Lansdale, PA

This office serves Lansdale and surrounding areas in the Philadelphia metro.

Allergy & Asthma Specialists provides a full range of allergy, asthma, and immunology services and treatment options – including allergy skin testing and allergy shots (immunotherapy). Before you leave your first appointment, our allergy and asthma doctors will have identified what you are allergic to and provided you with a customized plan to best treat your allergies or asthma. Our board-certified allergists can help stop your suffering, so schedule your appointment today.

Shot Room Hours

Tuesday: 9:20 am – 12:00 pm, 1:40 pm – 4:00 pm

Thursday: 9:20 am – 12:00 pm, 1:40 pm – 6:40 pm

Closed for lunch: 12:00 pm – 1:30 pm

Clinic Hours

Monday: 9:00 am – 5:00 pm

Tuesday: 9:00 am – 5:00 pm
